introduction.title: A few words about me
introduction.text1: After ten years in watchmaking, where precision, rigor, and attention to detail were part of my daily life, I decided to take on a new challenge : web development.
introduction.text2: This field fascinates me with its variety of tasks and endless possibilities. Many parallels can be drawn between watchmaking mechanics and code mechanics, and I enjoy imagining and inventing new virtual mechanisms every day.
introduction.text3: I am more motivated than ever to evolve in this universe and to bring my artisanal sensitivity acquired throughout my journey.
